alert.note: Alert for Central La Paz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 6:23PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central La Paz County through 700 PM MST... At 622 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of Vicksburg Junction, or 45 miles west of Tonopah. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects, as well as generate blowing dust. Locations impacted include... Vicksburg and Vicksburg Junction. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 38 and 59. US Highway 60 between mile markers 39 and 52. AZ Route 72 between mile markers 44 and 49. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Phoenix.
